casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Simpson, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Simpson (1996), 76 Ohio St.3d 131.]

(No. 96-587 — Submitted May 21, 1996 — Decided July 24, 1996.) Joseph T. Deters, Hamilton County Prosecuting Attorney, and Christian J. Schaefer, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Marcus Simpson, pro se. Per Curiam.

We affirm the judgment of the court of appeals for the reasons stated in its judgment entry.

Judgment affirmed.

Mover, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Stratton, JJ., concur.
